product_name: Outdoor Tech Turtle Shell 2.0 Portable Speaker
long_description: The Outdoor Tech Turtle Shell 2.0 Portable Speaker offers total sonic freedom in a rugged, water-resistant, Bluetooth(R)-enabled design that's perfect for adding tunes to your outdoor fun. Based on the original Turtle Shell, the 2.0 brings more volume, more Hi-Fi audio, more battery life and a plethora of other feature improvements. Features omnidirectional, room-filling audio with a distinctive design aesthetic and a durable construction built for the Appalachian trail. Small enough to stash in your fanny pack, Turtle Shell 2.0 sports dual speakers and a passive bass radiator that wirelessly provide 96 decibels of clear sound. Water-resistant, dust-proof and shockproof outer shell is probably tougher than you are; built-in microphone functionality allows easy, hands-free conference calls. Turtle Shell 2.0 uses Bluetooth to wirelessly stream Hi-Fi audio from your smartphone or other compatible devices. Rechargeable lithium-ion battery gives you up to 16 hours of play time. Reconnects automatically to previously paired device; external controls allow you to adjust volume, change tracks, play/pause and answer calls. Voice prompts let you know what is going on. aptX audio codec for high-quality stereo audio; AVCRP to control track and volume remotely. Standard camera tether and extra strong metal leash clip for multiple mounting options. Bluetooth 4.0 offers 32-ft. range with enhancements like battery level "fuel gauge" displayed on source device, quick connections and low power consumption. 3.5mm audio-in port; microUSB charge port. Comes with a USB charging cable, 3.5mm to 3.5mm cable, signature Outdoor Tech carry pouch, user manual and stickers.
